snippet.title: ONE NIGHT IN KAWAMI: "Welcome to the City of Rivers" Trailer
snippet.description:
A friendly and mysterious stranger guides you on a night out in Kawami. It's your first time in the big city. Make it count.

One Night in Kawami is available as a free download on Itch.io and Google Play Store - playable in English and Portuguese.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2615810/One_Night_in_Kawami/
Itch: https://brandnewwhatever.itch.io/onenightinkawami
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brandnewwhatever.onikawami

Trailer soundtrack (via freemusicarchive.com, CC BY 4.0)
"Struck Down With Love", Squire Tuck
"Burn Your Lovely Town", Rozkol
